com.appsrox.instachat

Class MessagesFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • android.support.v4.app.ListFragment
        • com.appsrox.instachat.MessagesFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<android.database.Cursor>, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener

    public class MessagesFragment
extends android.support.v4.app.ListFragment
implements android.support.v4.app.LoaderManager.LoaderCallbacks<android.database.Cursor>
    Chat fragment holding a single conversation.

    Activities containing this fragment MUST implement the Callbacks interface.
